name: Trisk
description:
Match 3 or more tiles vertically or horizontally to destroy them. Avoid tiles to reach the ceiling. Make more points by doing combo chains. And compete for the hi-score in the leaderboard.

Use a game pad or to play:

- Dpad / <arrow keys> : move cursor
- A button / <spacebar>: swap tiles
- B button / <"X" key>: speedup raising tiles

Game developed in 2 weeks for the #LowRezJam2017, using Pixelbox.

Help from DyoXynE for leaderboard integration.
